title: [Placements]: Online assessment online or offline mode
content:
What's the ratio of OAs happening in online and offline..do we need to go to college for everything (4th year placement) 
I am an ec campus student so travelling to rr often would be hectic

comments.body: First 2 months of placements, you need to go rr campus almost every other day. If u live near ec campus u need to take a 600F bus.

In the  oa's we gave for summer internships where we didn't have to go to rr campus, the questions mostly used to be so difficult that even with the help of ai we  couldn't pass all test cases , are they that difficult for placements also ?
Do we need competitive programming skills for most of them or is leetcode and stuff fine ?
